0019ce  f80ba001          STRB     r10,[r11,r1]          ;1007
0019d2  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1008
0019d6  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1008
0019d8  f80b2000          STRB     r2,[r11,r0]           ;1008
0019dc  f1010301          ADD      r3,r1,#1              ;1024
0019e0  b2d8              UXTB     r0,r3                 ;1024
0019e2  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1024
0019e6  f89d1004          LDRB     r1,[sp,#4]            ;1029
0019ea  f8b9203c          LDRH     r2,[r9,#0x3c]         ;1029
0019ee  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1029
0019f0  d147              BNE      |L1.6786|
0019f2  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1029
0019f6  f8992038          LDRB     r2,[r9,#0x38]         ;1029
0019fa  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1029
0019fc  d141              BNE      |L1.6786|
0019fe  f89d1006          LDRB     r1,[sp,#6]            ;1029
001a02  f899202c          LDRB     r2,[r9,#0x2c]         ;1029
001a06  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;1029
001a08  d13b              BNE      |L1.6786|
001a0a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1031
001a0e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1031
001a10  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1031
001a14  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1032
001a18  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1032
001a1a  f80b8001          STRB     r8,[r11,r1]           ;1032
001a1e  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a              ;1033
001a22  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1033
001a26  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1033
001a28  f80b2000          STRB     r2,[r11,r0]           ;1033
001a2c  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1034
001a30  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1034
001a32  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1034
001a36  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1035
001a3a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1035
001a3c  f80b7000          STRB     r7,[r11,r0]           ;1035
001a40  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1036
001a44  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1036
001a46  f80b2001          STRB     r2,[r11,r1]           ;1036
001a4a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1037
001a4e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1037
001a50  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1037
001a54  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1038
001a58  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]            ;1039
001a5c  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1039
001a60  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1039
001a64  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001a68  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]            ;1040
001a6c  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1040
001a6e  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1040
001a70  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001a74  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]            ;1041
001a78  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1041
001a7a  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1041
001a7c  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001a80  e4e6              B        |L1.5200|
                  |L1.6786|
001a82  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1045
001a86  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1045
001a88  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1045
001a8c  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1046
001a90  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1046
001a92  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1046
001a96  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1047
001a9a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1047
001a9c  f80b8000          STRB     r8,[r11,r0]           ;1047
001aa0  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1048
001aa4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1048
001aa6  f80b7001          STRB     r7,[r11,r1]           ;1048
001aaa  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1049
001aae  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1049
001ab0  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1049
001ab4  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1050
001ab8  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1050
001aba  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1050
001abe  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1051
001ac2  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1051
001ac4  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1051
001ac8  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1052
001acc  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1053
001ad0  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1053
001ad4  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1053
001ad8  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001adc  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;1054
001ae0  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1054
001ae2  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1054
001ae4  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001ae8  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1055
001aec  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1055
001aee  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1055
001af0  d303              BCC      |L1.6906|
001af2  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1055
001af6  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1055
                  |L1.6906|
001afa  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1056
001afe  488f              LDR      r0,|L1.7484|
001b00  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1056
001b02  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1056
001b06  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1056
001b08  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001b0c  e4a0              B        |L1.5200|
                  |L1.6926|
001b0e  4602              MOV      r2,r0                 ;1109
001b10  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1109
001b14  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0                 ;1109
001b16  f80b4002          STRB     r4,[r11,r2]           ;1109
001b1a  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1110
001b1e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1110
001b20  f80b6001          STRB     r6,[r11,r1]           ;1110
001b24  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1111
001b28  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1111
001b2a  f80b8000          STRB     r8,[r11,r0]           ;1111
001b2e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1112
001b32  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1112
001b34  f80b7001          STRB     r7,[r11,r1]           ;1112
001b38  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1113
001b3c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1113
001b3e  f80b4000          STRB     r4,[r11,r0]           ;1113
001b42  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;1114
001b46  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1114
001b48  f80b4001          STRB     r4,[r11,r1]           ;1114
001b4c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;1115
001b50  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1115
001b52  f80b6000          STRB     r6,[r11,r0]           ;1115
001b56  f80b5001          STRB     r5,[r11,r1]           ;1116
001b5a  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;1117
001b5e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;1117
001b62  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;1117
001b66  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001b6a  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;1118
001b6e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1118
001b70  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;1118
001b72  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001b76  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1119
001b7a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;1119
001b7c  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;1119
001b7e  d303              BCC      |L1.7048|
001b80  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;1119
001b84  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;1119
                  |L1.7048|
001b88  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;1120
001b8c  486b              LDR      r0,|L1.7484|
001b8e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;1120
001b90  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;1120
001b94  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;1120
001b96  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001b9a  e459              B        |L1.5200|
;;;1125   
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;1126   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1127   void community2lcd(char* in,
001b9c  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;1128   			char xy,
;;;1129   			char flash_pos,
;;;1130   			char flash_on)
;;;1131   {
001b9e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001ba0  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001ba2  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001ba4  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;1132   char temp;
;;;1133   char i;
;;;1134   //char n;
;;;1135   
;;;1136   
;;;1137   i=find(xy);
001ba6  f7fffffe          BL       find
001baa  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;1138   
;;;1139   //in1=192;
;;;1140   
;;;1141   //in2=34;
;;;1142   
;;;1143   
;;;1144   
;;;1145   temp=i;
001bac  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;1146   
;;;1147   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1148   if(temp!=255)
;;;1149   while (*in)
;;;1150   	{
;;;1151   	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001bae  4d64              LDR      r5,|L1.7488|
001bb0  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;1148
001bb2  d106              BNE      |L1.7106|
001bb4  e008              B        |L1.7112|
                  |L1.7094|
001bb6  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001bb8  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;1152   	temp++;
001bbc  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001bc0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.7106|
001bc2  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1149
001bc4  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1149
001bc6  d1f6              BNE      |L1.7094|
                  |L1.7112|
;;;1153       	}
;;;1154   
;;;1155   
;;;1156   
;;;1157   if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001bc8  485e              LDR      r0,|L1.7492|
001bca  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001bcc  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001bce  d006              BEQ      |L1.7134|
001bd0  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
001bd2  d004              BEQ      |L1.7134|
;;;1158   	{
;;;1159   	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
001bd4  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
001bd8  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
001bdc  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.7134|
;;;1160   	}
;;;1161   
;;;1162   }
001bde  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;1163   
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;1164   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1165   void ip2lcd(	short in1,
001be0  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;1166   			short in2,
;;;1167   			short in3,
;;;1168   			short in4,
;;;1169   			char xy,
;;;1170   			char flash_pos)
;;;1171   {
001be4  4607              MOV      r7,r0
001be6  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
001bea  4688              MOV      r8,r1
001bec  4691              MOV      r9,r2
001bee  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;1172   char i;
;;;1173   //char n;
;;;1174   
;;;1175   //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;1176   //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;1177   i=find(xy);
001bf0  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1178   
;;;1179   //in1=192;
;;;1180   
;;;1181   //in2=34;
;;;1182   
;;;1183   if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001bf4  4b53              LDR      r3,|L1.7492|
;;;1184   	{
;;;1185   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
001bf6  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
001bf8  4c51              LDR      r4,|L1.7488|
;;;1186   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;1187   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;1188   	}
;;;1189   else 
;;;1190   	{
;;;1191   	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
001bfa  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;1192   	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;1193   	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
001bfc  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
001c00  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;1183
001c02  d109              BNE      |L1.7192|
001c04  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;1183  ; bFL2
001c06  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7192|
001c08  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1185
001c0c  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;1185
001c10  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;1185
001c12  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;1186
001c14  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;1187
001c16  e017              B        |L1.7240|
                  |L1.7192|
001c18  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;1191
001c1c  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;1191
001c20  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;1191
001c24  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;1191
001c28  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;1191
001c2c  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;1192
001c30  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;1192
001c34  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;1192
001c38  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;1192
001c3c  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001c40  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001c44  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.7240|
;;;1194   	}
;;;1195   
;;;1196   if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001c48  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001c4a  d109              BNE      |L1.7264|
001c4c  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001c4e  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7264|
;;;1197   	{
;;;1198   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
001c50  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001c54  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001c58  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1199   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001c5a  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1200   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001c5c  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001c5e  e017              B        |L1.7312|
                  |L1.7264|
;;;1201   	}
;;;1202   else 
;;;1203   	{
;;;1204   	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
001c60  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001c64  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001c68  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001c6c  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001c70  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
001c74  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;1205   	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001c78  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001c7c  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
001c80  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001c84  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1206   	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
001c86  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
001c8a  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001c8e  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7312|
;;;1207   	}
;;;1208   
;;;1209   if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
001c90  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
001c92  d109              BNE      |L1.7336|
001c94  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001c96  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.7336|
;;;1210   	{
;;;1211   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
001c98  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001c9c  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001ca0  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;1212   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
001ca2  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;1213   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
001ca4  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
001ca6  e017              B        |L1.7384|
                  |L1.7336|
;;;1214   	}
;;;1215   else 
;;;1216   	{
;;;1217   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
001ca8  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001cac  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001cb0  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001cb4  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001cb8  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
001cbc  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1218   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001cc0  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
001cc4  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
001cc8  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001ccc  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1219   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001cce  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001cd2  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001cd6  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.7384|
;;;1220   	}
;;;1221   
;;;1222   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
001cd8  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
001cda  d109              BNE      |L1.7408|
001cdc  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001cde  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.7408|
;;;1223   	{
;;;1224   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
001ce0  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1225   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001ce2  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001ce4  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
001ce8  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1226   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
001cea  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.7404|
;;;1227   	}
;;;1228   else 
;;;1229   	{
;;;1230   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1231   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1232   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1233   	}
;;;1234   }
001cec  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.7408|
001cf0  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1230
001cf4  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1230
001cf8  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1230
001cfc  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1230
001cfe  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1231
001d02  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1231
001d06  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1231
001d08  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1231
001d0c  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1231
001d10  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1231
001d12  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1232
001d16  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1232
001d1a  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1232
001d1c  e7e6              B        |L1.7404|
;;;1235   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1236   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1237   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
001d1e  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1238   {
001d20  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1239   char i;
;;;1240   i=find(xy);
001d22  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1241   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
001d26  4906              LDR      r1,|L1.7488|
001d28  b11c              CBZ      r4,|L1.7474|
001d2a  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
001d2e  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
;;;1242   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1243   }
001d30  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L1.7474|
001d32  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1242
001d36  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1242
001d38  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
001d3a  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.7484|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.7488|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.7492|
                          DCD      bFL2
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1275   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1276   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
001d48  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1277   {
;;;1278   char i;
;;;1279   char n;
;;;1280   
;;;1281   i=(20*y)+x;
001d4a  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001d4e  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
001d52  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1282   
;;;1283   n=*((char*)&in);
001d54  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1284   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001d58  48ce              LDR      r0,|L1.8340|
001d5a  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
001d5e  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
001d60  49cd              LDR      r1,|L1.8344|
001d62  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1285   i--;
001d64  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001d68  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1286   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001d6a  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001d6e  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001d70  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1287   i--;
001d72  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001d76  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1288   
;;;1289   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
001d78  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1290   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001d7c  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001d80  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001d82  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1291   i--;
001d84  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001d88  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1292   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001d8a  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001d8e  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001d90  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1293   i--;
001d92  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001d96  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1294   
;;;1295   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
001d98  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1296   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001d9c  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001da0  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001da2  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1297   i--;
001da4  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001da8  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1298   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001daa  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001dae  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001db0  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1299   i--;
001db2  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001db6  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1300   
;;;1301   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
001db8  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1302   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001dbc  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
001dc0  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001dc2  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1303   i--;
001dc4  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
001dc8  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1304   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001dca  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
001dce  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
001dd0  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1305   i--;
;;;1306   }
001dd2  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1307   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1379   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1380   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
001dd4  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1381   {
;;;1382   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
001dd6  49b1              LDR      r1,|L1.8348|
001dd8  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
001dda  4baf              LDR      r3,|L1.8344|
001ddc  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
001de0  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
001de4  428a              CMP      r2,r1
001de6  d104              BNE      |L1.7666|
001de8  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001dec  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1383   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1384   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1385   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1386   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1387   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1388   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1389   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1390   }
001df0  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7666|
001df2  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1383
001df4  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1383
001df6  d106              BNE      |L1.7686|
001df8  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1383
001dfc  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1383
001e00  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1383
001e04  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7686|
001e06  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1384
001e08  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1384
001e0a  d106              BNE      |L1.7706|
001e0c  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1384
001e10  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1384
001e14  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1384
001e18  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7706|
001e1a  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1385
001e1c  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1385
001e1e  d106              BNE      |L1.7726|
001e20  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1385
001e24  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1385
001e28  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1385
001e2c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7726|
001e2e  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1386
001e30  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1386
001e32  d106              BNE      |L1.7746|
001e34  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1386
001e38  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1386
001e3c  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1386
001e40  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7746|
001e42  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1387
001e44  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1387
001e46  d106              BNE      |L1.7766|
001e48  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1387
001e4c  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1387
001e50  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1387
001e54  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7766|
001e56  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1388
001e58  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1388
001e5a  d106              BNE      |L1.7786|
001e5c  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1388
001e60  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1388
001e64  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1388
                  |L1.7784|
001e68  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.7786|
001e6a  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1389
001e6c  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1389
001e6e  d1fb              BNE      |L1.7784|
001e70  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1389
001e74  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1389
001e78  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1389
001e7c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1391   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1393   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1394   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
001e7e  4b88              LDR      r3,|L1.8352|
;;;1395   {
;;;1396   ind_pointer--;
001e80  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001e82  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
001e86  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
001e88  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
;;;1397   if(ind_pointer<=0)ind_pointer=0;
001e8a  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
001e8c  dc02              BGT      |L1.7828|
001e8e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
001e92  801a              STRH     r2,[r3,#0]
                  |L1.7828|
;;;1398   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
001e94  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001e96  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
001e98  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
001e9a  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1399   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
001e9c  4a81              LDR      r2,|L1.8356|
001e9e  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001ea2  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
001ea4  487d              LDR      r0,|L1.8348|
001ea6  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
001ea8  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
001eaa  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
001eac  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1400   
;;;1401   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
001eae  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
001eb0  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
001eb2  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1402   }
001eb4  4770              BX       lr
;;;1403   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1404   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1405   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
001eb6  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1406   {
;;;1407   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
001eb8  4d79              LDR      r5,|L1.8352|
001eba  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001ebe  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
001ec2  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
001ec4  4d77              LDR      r5,|L1.8356|
001ec6  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
001eca  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
001ecc  4c73              LDR      r4,|L1.8348|
001ece  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
001ed0  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
001ed2  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
001ed4  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1408   ind=(i_enum)tind;
001ed6  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1409   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
001ed8  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1410   index_set=tindex_set;
001eda  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1411   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
001edc  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1412   }
001ede  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1413   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1414   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1415   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
001ee0  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1416   {
001ee4  4680              MOV      r8,r0
001ee6  460f              MOV      r7,r1
001ee8  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1417   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1418   clr_scrn();
001eea  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1419   
;;;1420   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
001eee  4c6a              LDR      r4,|L1.8344|
;;;1421   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001ef0  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.7924|
;;;1422   	{
;;;1423   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
001ef4  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
001ef8  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
001efc  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1421
001f00  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1421
001f02  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1421
001f04  d3f6              BCC      |L1.7924|
;;;1424   	}
;;;1425   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001f06  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.7946|
;;;1426   	{
;;;1427   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
001f0a  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
001f0e  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001f12  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1425
001f16  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1425
001f18  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1425
001f1a  d3f6              BCC      |L1.7946|
;;;1428   	}
;;;1429   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001f1c  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.7968|
;;;1430   	{
;;;1431   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
001f20  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
001f24  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001f28  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1429
001f2c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1429
001f2e  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1429
001f30  d3f6              BCC      |L1.7968|
;;;1432   	}
;;;1433   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001f32  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.7990|
;;;1434   	{
;;;1435   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
001f36  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
001f3a  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001f3e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1433
001f42  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1433
001f44  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1433
001f46  d3f6              BCC      |L1.7990|
;;;1436   	}
;;;1437   
;;;1438   
;;;1439   }
001f48  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1440   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1456   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1457   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
001f4c  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1458   {
001f4e  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1459   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1460   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1461   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1462   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);
001f50  f04f0564          MOV      r5,#0x64
001f54  fb94f4f5          SDIV     r4,r4,r5
001f58  4d53              LDR      r5,|L1.8360|
001f5a  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;1463   show_mess_p1=p1;
001f5c  4c53              LDR      r4,|L1.8364|
001f5e  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
;;;1464   show_mess_p2=p2;
001f60  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8368|
001f62  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
;;;1465   show_mess_p3=p3;
001f64  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8372|
001f66  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
;;;1466   show_mess_p4=p4;
001f68  4853              LDR      r0,|L1.8376|
001f6a  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
;;;1467   }
001f6c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1468   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1495   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1496   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
001f6e  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1497   {
001f72  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1498   char iii;
;;;1499   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1500   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1501   		
;;;1502   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1503   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1504   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1505   tempii*=32;
001f74  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1506   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
001f78  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
001f7c  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1507        
;;;1508   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
001f7e  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
001f80  4620              MOV      r0,r4
001f82  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1509   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
001f86  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
001f88  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
001f8c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1510   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
001f90  4669              MOV      r1,sp
001f92  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
001f96  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1511   
;;;1512   iii=find(simbol);
001f9a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
001f9c  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1513   
;;;1514   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001fa0  4c3d              LDR      r4,|L1.8344|
001fa2  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
001fa6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001faa  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001fac  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1515   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001fae  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
001fb2  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001fb6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001fb8  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1516   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
001fba  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
001fbe  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001fc2  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001fc4  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1517   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
001fc8  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
001fcc  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001fd0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001fd2  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1518   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001fd6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001fda  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001fdc  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1519   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001fde  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001fe2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001fe4  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1520   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001fe6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001fea  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001fec  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1521   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
001fee  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
001ff2  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001ff6  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
001ff8  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1522   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
001ffa  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
001ffe  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
002002  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
002006  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1523   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
00200a  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
00200e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002010  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
002012  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1524   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
002016  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
00201a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00201c  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
00201e  d303              BCC      |L1.8232|
002020  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
002024  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.8232|
;;;1525   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
002028  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
00202c  4923              LDR      r1,|L1.8380|
00202e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002030  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
002034  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
002036  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1526   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
00203a  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
00203e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002040  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1527   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002042  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
002046  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
002048  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1528   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00204a  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
00204e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002050  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1529   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
002054  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
002058  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00205c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00205e  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1530   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
002060  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
002064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
002066  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1531   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
002068  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
00206c  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
00206e  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1532   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
002072  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
002076  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
00207a  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
00207e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1533   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
002082  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
002086  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
002088  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
00208a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1534      		     		
;;;1535   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
00208e  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1536   }	
002090  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L1.8340|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.8344|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.8348|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.8352|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.8356|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.8360|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L1.8364|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L1.8368|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L1.8372|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L1.8376|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L1.8380|
                          DCD      sm_mont

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.3||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.4||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L4.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L4.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4a06              LDR      r2,|L5.40|
00000e  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
000012  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
000014  4b05              LDR      r3,|L5.44|
000016  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
000022  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
000024  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
000026  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L5.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L6.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L6.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.76|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L7.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L7.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L7.148|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L7.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.8||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.8||, ||.text||
                  show_mess_number PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  e9dd4606          LDRD     r4,r6,[sp,#0x18]
000006  9d05              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x14]
000008  f04f0764          MOV      r7,#0x64
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000c  fb95f5f7          SDIV     r5,r5,r7
000010  4f07              LDR      r7,|L8.48|
000012  703d              STRB     r5,[r7,#0]
000014  4d07              LDR      r5,|L8.52|
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
000018  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.56|
00001a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
00001c  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.60|
00001e  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
000020  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.64|
000022  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
000024  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.68|
000026  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
000028  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.72|
00002a  7006              STRB     r6,[r0,#0]
00002c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00002e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L8.48|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L8.52|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L8.56|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L8.60|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L8.64|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L8.68|
                          DCD      show_mess_number_
                  |L8.72|
                          DCD      show_mess_komma
